long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Wolfia helps modern companies automate security questionnaires and RFPs. Our Chrome extension brings Wolfia's powerful automation directly to your browser, allowing you to complete questionnaires in a fraction of the time with minimal manual effort.

Key Features:

• AI-Powered Response Generation: Get accurate, tailored answers to security questions instantly.
• Smart Portal Detection: Works seamlessly in various vendor risk management portals (OneTrust, Whistic, Panorays, etc.) and spreadsheets.
• Knowledge Base Integration: Leverages your existing security documentation and past responses for consistency and accuracy.
• Real-Time Updates: Keeps your posture current as your practices evolve.

How It Works:

• Import or highlight questions in your browser
• Wolfia AI searches your knowledge base for relevant information
• AI generates accurate, tailored responses
• Review, edit, and approve responses

Perfect for startups and growing tech companies, Wolfia platform helps you compete effectively with established players. By automating a critical but time-consuming aspect of the enterprise sales process, you can focus your resources on innovation and customer relationships.

Note: You must have an existing Wolfia account to use this extension. Don't have one? Visit wolfia.com to get started.
